item.title: Storage class support in Ozone
item.description: Storage class support in Ozone Abstract One of the fundamental abstraction of Ozone is the Container which used as the unit of the replication. Containers have to favors: Open and Closed containers: Open containers are replicated by Ratis and writable, Closed containers are replicated with data copy and read only.

item.title: S3 Access key management for improved usability
item.description: NOTE: latest version can be found in the Apache repository Problem statement Ozone has the semantics of volume and buckets while S3 has only buckets. To make it possible to use the same bucket both from Hadoop world and via S3 we need a mapping between then.
